long_description: Set out on a warm-weather adventure with the REI Explorer hat. Its wide brim shields your face and neck from the sun. Organic cotton exterior is durable and breathable; organic cotton is grown without the use of toxic pesticides. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. 3 in. brim shades your neck and face from the sun. Brass snaps on either side of hat let you snap 1 or both sides of the brim up. Chin strap secures the REI Explorer hat when the wind picks up.
short_description: Set out on a warm-weather adventure with the REI Explorer hat. Its wide brim shields your face and neck from the sun.
